title: Viral Photo of Map of India Shows Wrong Boundaries of J&K, Ladakh
subtitle: New Map of India: A viral photo claiming to show the new map of India  shows the updated boundaries of Jammu & Kashmir and Ladakh, with roughly equal areas allotted to the two new Union Territories. But it’s fake and shows incorrect boundaries.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A picture of the political map of India is viral on social media, claiming to be India’s new map post the bifurcation of Jammu & Kashmir. The picture shows the updated boundaries of Jammu & Kashmir and Ladakh, with roughly equal areas allotted to the two new Union Territories.

The picture was posted with the caption “New Map India”.
